label: content
comment: A content, expressed as text, of this note.
Content, expressed as text, for this work item complex description.
Content, expressed as text, of this document clause.
Content, expressed as text, of this packaging marking.
The content, expressed as text, of this specification query.
The content, expressed as text, of this specification response.

domainIncludes.comment: A distinct article or provision in a contract, treaty, will, or other formal or legal written document, which requires compliance.
An aggregation of descriptive information consisting of different but related characteristics that together constitute a complex description.
An inscription, stamp or label such as to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A formally raised question or request for information.
A reply, answer, or additional message that is usually in response to a question or query.
